ComicInfo.Title: Heroes Part 2 of 2
ComicInfo.Summary: Heroes Part 2 of 2: With the Orville officially being ordered not to interfere, Talla assumes the role of legendary Okudum heroine Xandia in an attempt to stop the Nazh from enslaving the Okudum.
